cont.entity_a: Fire hazard recall on a switch, but replacement costs are not covered.

Durability.comm: Durability concerns with parts rusting and leaking over time.

cont.entity_a: Expected lifespan is about 2-3 years, but units have rust issues. Units often require frequent replacements due to leaks and rust. Durability is a concern, with many units failing shortly after the warranty period.
cont.entity_b: Some users experienced early motor burnout.

Installation.comm: Direct replacement for older models makes installation straightforward.

cont.entity_a: Installation can be straightforward but may lack necessary components like power cords. Easy to install with existing mounts, but requires additional electrical work.
cont.entity_b: Installation can be challenging due to mounting and wiring complexities.

cont.entity_a: Some units have quality control issues, such as not working out of the box.
Customer service can be unresponsive and warranty claims cumbersome.
Quiet operation compared to older models.
cont.entity_b: Noise level is high compared to older models. Quiet operation and compact size are appreciated.

cont.entity_a: The same mounting system allows for easy replacement.

cont.entity_b: Does not include a power cord; needs to be purchased separately.
Affordable price for the performance offered.
Good for light to medium use but may struggle with larger items.
